channel.title: CVE Feed for Everywhere -- CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Everywhere -- CMS

item.title: CVE-2020-36537|2024-08-04T17:30:08.266Z -- everywhere -- cms
item.description: A vulnerability was found in Everywhere CMS. It has been classified as critical. Affected is an unknown function. The manipulation of the argument id leads to sql injection. It is possible to launch the attack remotely.
